TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Figure extends System.Windows.Documents.AnchoredBlock

summary.span: An inline-level flow content element used to host a figure.

span.span: An inline-level flow content element used to host a figure.

summary.span: A *figure* is a portion of flow content with placement properties that can be customized independently from the primary content flow within a .

span.span: A *figure* is a portion of flow content with placement properties that can be customized independently from the primary content flow within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需詳細資訊內容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 或項目通常用來反白顯示或強調部分內容，以支援映像或其他內容的主要內容流程內的主機或鬆散插入相關內容，例如廣告。 or elements are often used to highlight or accentuate portions of content, to host supporting images or other content within the main content flow, or to inject loosely related content such as advertisements. 和數種方式不同，並且用於不同的案例。 and differ in several ways and are used for different scenarios. **圖表：****Figure:** - 可以定位︰可以設定其水平和垂直錨點，將它固定在頁面、內容、資料行或段落的相對位置。Can be positioned: You can set its horizontal and vertical anchors to dock it relative to the page, content, column or paragraph. 您也可以使用其和屬性來指定任意位移。You can also use its and properties to specify arbitrary offsets. - 可調整為多個資料行： 您可以設定高度和寬度的頁面、 內容或資料行的高度或寬度的倍數。Is sizable to more than one column: You can set height and width to multiples of page, content or column height or width. 請注意，如果是頁面及內容，倍數不能大於 1。Note that in the case of page and content, multiples greater than 1 are not allowed. 例如，您可以在這裡設定的寬度是 「 0.5 倍頁面 」 或 「 0.25 倍內容 」 或 「 2 個資料行 」。For example, you can set the width of a to be "0.5 page" or "0.25 content" or "2 Column". 您也可以將高度和寬度設為絕對像素值。You can also set height and width to absolute pixel values. - 不分頁︰ 如果內的內容未符合內部，它會轉譯任何符合最適大小，其餘的內容會遺失Does not paginate: If the content inside a does not fit inside the , it will render whatever content does fit and the remaining content is lost **Floater：****Floater:** - 無法定位，但會轉譯任何可用的空間。Cannot be positioned and will render wherever space can be made available for it. 您不能設定位移或錨點。You cannot set the offset or anchor a . - 無法調整為多個資料行： 根據預設，為一個資料行的大小。Cannot be sized to more than one column: By default, sizes at one column. 它有屬性可以設定為絕對像素值，但此值是否大於一個資料行寬度，則會忽略它，且 floater 大小為一個資料行。It has a property that can be set to an absolute pixel value, but if this value is greater than one column width it is ignored and the floater is sized at one column. 大小不超過一個資料行藉由設定正確的像素寬度，但調整大小不是資料行相關，所以 「 0.5 個"不是有效的運算式寬度。You can size it to less than one column by setting the correct pixel width, but sizing is not column-relative, so "0.5Column" is not a valid expression for width. 沒有高度屬性，而且無法設定高度，其高度取決於內容 has no height property and it's height cannot be set, it’s height depends on the content - 編頁： 如果指定寬度的內容延伸到 1 個以上的資料行高度，floater 會中斷並分頁至下一個資料行的下一個頁面上，依此類推。 paginates: If its content at its specified width extends to more than 1 column height, floater breaks and paginates to the next column, the next page, etc. 是您想要用來控制大小的好地方放置獨立內容位置，並確定內容可納入指定的大小。 is a good place to put standalone content where you want to control the size and positioning, and are confident that the content will fit in the specified size. 是放置自由的更多內容，類似於主頁面內容，但會分開的好地方。 is a good place to put more free-flowing content that flows similar to the main page content, but is separated from it. ## Examples 下列範例會定義，其中包含同時和項目。The following example defines a that contains both and elements. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterFigureXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_floaterfigurexaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 浮動器和 FlowDocument 中的數據](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument 中的數字的浮動器和")![Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument")

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this figure can delay its placement in the flow of content.

value.span: * * true * * 如果此圖可以延遲放置;否則，* * false * *。

span.span: **true** if this figure can delay placement; otherwise, **false**.
The default value is **true**.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the distance that a is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction.

value.span: 在水平方向相對於基準的位移距離，以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

span.span: The distance that a is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction, in device independent pixels.
The default value is **0.0**.
